resources.string:
Info
 ----------------------------

 This app is for insert record to Firebase. With easy way to create/add new records and with Swipable Edit & Delete
 You can edit & delete record with just one Swipe

 This demo contains..
 ---------
 • Data listing (Firebase)
 • Create (Firebase)
 • Edit (Firebase)
 • Delete (Firebase)
 ---------

 • Ripple Effect
 • Swipe Functionality (for Edit & Delete)
 • Simple animation



 Happy coding………
